app.name: Doodle Jump
app.long_description:
Doodle Jump recreated for the Wii.
Controls: (A) Restart (when game over) (1) [EXPERIMENTAL] Take a screenshot (+) Pause (Home) Exit to loader
Credits: Libogc/devkitPPC: shagkur, WinterMute (and all other contributers) GRRLIB: NoNameNo (and other contributers)
Special Thanks: My beta testers: Doodle Jump Creator: Lima Sky
